content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: MATEST
      operator: equal_to
      value: Clinical Signs Follow-up
    - name: MASPEC
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.178
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: When MATEST is 'Clinical Signs Follow-up' MASPEC should not be used.
Outcome:
  Message: When MATEST is 'Clinical Signs Follow-up' MASPEC may not be populated.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '178'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: MASPEC defines the base organ or tissue examined and
                  is required when MATEST is 'Gross Pathological Examination'. It
                  should not be used when MATEST is 'Clinical Signs Follow-up'.
                Document: SENDIG v3.1
                Section: Section 6.3.7.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - MA

json.Description: When MATEST is 'Clinical Signs Follow-up' MASPEC should not be used.

Outcome.Message: When MATEST is 'Clinical Signs Follow-up' MASPEC may not be populated.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: MASPEC defines the base organ or tissue examined and is required when MATEST is 'Gross Pathological Examination'. It should not be used when MATEST is 'Clinical Signs Follow-up'.
